name: fcc-classroom-mode
description: A Classroom Mode for your Students
author: freeCodeCamp <team@freecodecamp.org> (https://freecodecamp.org)

scripts.precommit: npm test --prefix server && npm run precommit-test --prefix client
scripts.start: cd server && npm install && node start.js
scripts.setup: npm install && npm install --prefix server && npm install --prefix client
scripts.heroku-postbuild: cd client && npm install --only=dev && npm install && npm run build
scripts.test: npm run server-test && npm run client-test
